fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**The Unspeakable** â€” Each day, choose a player. At the beginning of the next night, they lose all abilities and attributes that night, and they must send you one integer. If they fail to do so before the night ends, you'll attack them.
- During the day, choose to expose the player you chose last night, publicly revealing their role. Then, you attack them if their role's post number isn't the same as the integer they sent you. You may only do this once.
- During the day, choose to eliminate the player you chose last night, attacking them. You may only do this one thousand nine hundred eighty-three times.
